description: Try our easy to follow Rice & Bean Salad + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Rice & Bean Salad + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g mexican style 3 bean mix (for rice & bean salad)
0.5 cup brown rice (for rice & bean salad)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice in a saucepan of boiling water following packet instructions. Refresh under cold running water. Drain.
Combine rice, bean mix, carrot, cheese and vinegar in a bowl. Serves 2. Pack salad in an airtight container and refrigerate until required.
Snack 1: Top each chicken slice with capsicum and snow peas. Roll up. Place in an airtight container.
Snack 2: Sprinkle cinnamon over yoghurt. Place in an airtight container.
Snack 3: Place watermelon in airtight container.
